author: Chris Rinearson
comment: Uninstalled a couple times now and still get no companion app.  Default colors and settings are kinda ugly (at least to me) and with no way to change them, its a deal-breaker.
title: No companion app...

author: Lillian Fanning
comment: Easy to use and change the design and color of the watch face. Make the changes to the design on your phone. Click sync. The changes immediately appear on your watch!
title: Good watch faces choices!!!

author: jason perez
comment: The weather is not accurate at all.  Having difficulty getting texts.

reply.author: Simon Barke
reply.content:
Thanks a lot for your feedback.
You can see what the weather service provided for your location at "Advanced settings" -> "Last successful weather update". High and low temperature are not daily but for the upcoming 24 hours. More frequent weather updates improve the accuracy of the current condition. Please let us know if this helps. :)

title: LG G Watch R

author: Eduardo Ferrá
comment: Very good app and great faces.   Would be even better if it had an option to increase the width of the hands/change their shape.

reply.author: Simon Barke
reply.content:
Thanks a lot for your feedback. :)
Different shapes are more complicated, but increased width should be quite easy. We will implement this feature in a future version.

author: +Eric young
comment: This is one of my favorite watch face. It just is classic
title: Classic!

author: tiby borsos
comment: After the last update is not work...Please fix.

reply.author: Simon Barke
reply.content:
Hi Tiby, thanks for the feedback. :)
Can you contact us via email so we can figure out what's going wrong? What exactly is happening on the LG G Watch? We would be happy to help as quickly as possible, but we have no G Watch to test it.

title: No work on LG G Watch

author: Steve Smith
comment: The look the options just everything about it is done really well. Kept up to date as well the last update was very good. They listen to feedback
title: Love it alright

author: Jeremy Cockle
comment: Love it! One of my favourite faces. My only problem is that the maximum /minimum temperature is both showing the current temp all the time.  Update: fixed! Great responsive Dev! Fixed in a day.

reply.author: Simon Barke
reply.content:
Hi Jeremy, thanks a lot for the feedback. :)
Could you send us an email with your current location? Either forecast data is not available for your location (that would be bad) or the temperature really is absolutely constant at your location (unlikely ^^). Maybe we could implement a second weather API, but first we need to know what's going on.

title: Beautiful watch face

author: Dave Regan
comment: I'm running this on a ZenWatch. Nice concept but this needs some work. The multi-colored border around the watch is tacky IMO. There should be an option to disable it. Weather info is hard to read in dimmed mode. I'd love to see a gray and a white color option. Actually, why not just have a color wheel so that you can choose any color? Has potential to be a lot better.

reply.author: Simon Barke
reply.content:
Thanks for your feedback. :)
You can disable the multi-colored ring (battery ring in companion app).
A gray/silver-ish version is in the works (together with gold, red and purple). With all the different shades, gradients and shadows, a color wheel is quite complicated to implement. We are thinking about that though. Updates are coming, stay tuned.

title: Needs some work

author: J Johnson
comment: Awesome  but battery life on moto 360 seems to be pretty bad, was at 30 % after only a few hours the first day I used it.   Still gets 5 stars though as I'm sure this will get better with time. -- Didn't see a reply option so adding to this.  I am giving that a try actually, that is some impressive battery life.  Also uninstalled some stuff that might be running as well. Its possible that it just uses more than my previous watch face app and I have to adjust slightly to be able to use yours.  Which to recap is awesome.

reply.author: Simon Barke
reply.content: Thanks a lot for the feedback. :-) We are running it on the Moto 360 with heavy usage, down from 100% to 62% in 9 hours (ambient screen off). Battery life is very important  and we need to get this right for everyone. Please try to disable developer mode/ADB Bluetooth debugging on phone and watch. Does it help to disable the 'battery ring'?

title: Awesome

author: Nick Proctor
comment: App crashes if I try to select any other colour apart from orange.

reply.author: Simon Barke
reply.content: Thanks a lot for your feedback. :-) We already got a crash report and think we know what happens. Can you confirm that you are running lollipop? (seems to be limited to certain lollipop devices, fix is on the way)

title: Unable to change display colour

author: IDLE 0095
comment: Dev is fast in fixing issues.
title: Issues

author: Tennessee Tony
comment: LG G Watch. Never synced with watch And no way to change settings
title: Didn't work
